item.title: RVATukTuk Sightseeing Tour of Richmond
item.description: Many vehicle tours through Richmond can have obstructed views, but this Richmond Tuk-tuk Sightseeing Tour provides a ride around the city in an open-air vehicle that’s easy to see top spots along the way. Plus, this tour stops at Virginia Museum of Fine Arts, Hollywood Cemetery, and Virginia State Capitol and passes more than four popular sites. Book this Richmond tour today and support a woman-owned business.

image.alt: RVATukTuk Sightseeing Tour of Richmond

item.title: Richmond Downtown Walking Tour
item.description: This leisurely stroll takes you through downtown Richmond with a guide who will tell you about the layers of history all around you. Talk about the town’s role in the Revolution, Civil War, and more. This is a small group tour, so you’ll keep costs down by sharing your guide, but still have an intimate tour group. You’ll also be wearing a headset on tour to encourage safe distancing.

image.alt: Richmond Downtown Walking Tour

item.title: Arts District Food Tour in Richmond
item.description: Discover Richmond’s food, history, and culture on this guided walking tour through the city’s recently established Arts District. Try food tastings from a variety of local restaurants and cafes. Visit a rotating selection of establishments in Richmond's Arts District. Along the way, sample coal-fired pizzas, Korean street eats, Southern soul food, and more.

image.alt: Arts District Food Tour in Richmond

item.title: The Carytown Food Tour in Richmond
item.description: Discover Carytown’s food, history and culture on this walking tour near Richmond, Virginia. Try food tastings from five or six local restaurants, cafes and shops. Visit East Coast Provisions, Xtra's Cafe, Don't Look Back, Virginia Diner Shoppe and Carytown Cupcakes. Along the way, sample local seafood, world-famous tacos, popular Virginia peanuts and learn about the Mile of Style’s colorful history.

image.alt: The Carytown Food Tour in Richmond

item.title: RVA Ghosts Shockoe Bottom Sinister Scares by US Ghost Adventures
item.description: See a different side of Virginia’s capital city during this Richmond Ghosts and Haunted Dark History Walking Tour. Instead of regular sightseeing, you’ll dive into documented accounts of historical hauntings and true stories of history with a guide who knows the area and its chilly tales well. Visit up to 12 locations, including Adam Craig House, C&O Church Hill Tunnel West Portal, Jefferson Park, Edgar Allan Poe Museum, Libby Prison, and Masons' Hall.

image.alt: RVA Ghosts Shockoe Bottom Sinister Scares by US Ghost Adventures

item.title: Richmond Landmark Segway Tour
item.description: Cover more Richmond sights in less time with a Richmond Segway tour. This tour lets you glide around Virginia’s capital city with ease, taking you to top sights like the Canal Walk, Old City Hall, and St. Paul’s Church, all while filling you in facts and stories from Richmond history. Choose from multiple tour durations and departure times to find a tour that fits your schedule.

image.alt: Richmond Landmark Segway Tour

item.title: Historic Trolley Tour
item.description: Richmond, as the birthplace of the United States, is rich with history and culture! Travel through 400 years of history on board our tour with a knowledgeable and engaging tour guide!

image.alt: Historic Trolley Tour

item.title: Hiking the James River in Richmond, VA
item.description: Discover Richmond's most interesting and unique feature - the James River! This guided hike will show off the best the park has to offer, without having to worry about getting lost or missing something. Sweeping views of downtown Richmond interspersed with feeling lost in nature - there's something for every outdoor lover!

image.alt: Hiking the James River in Richmond, VA

item.title: Church Hill Chillers Ghost Tour
item.description: Meet your ghost guide to start your tour of Richmond’s Historic Church Hill, where you will visit several landmarks on your search for ghosts. This is a small), and will run for about an hour and a half. You’ll stop at Patrick Henry’s Pub & Grille, an old tobacco warehouse, the Bellevue Elementary school, and more, learning about all the spooky haunts along the way.

image.alt: Church Hill Chillers Ghost Tour

item.title: Delicious Pizza & Ice Cream Tour of Richmond
item.description:
Hop onto our 14-passenger bus and explore Richmond in the best way possible - though pizza and ice cream! We’ll visit three of our favorite pizza spots AND three incredible ice cream shops for a fun, filling, and (obviously) delicious afternoon.
Highlights include: - Try pizza made from a naturally-fermented sourdough crust, and taste the difference - Three different pizzas, three different pizza styles - Visit an award-winning ice cream maker’s very first scoop shop
We suggest bringing a bottle of water – we’re visiting places with the best pizza and ice cream, not necessarily the places with the largest dining room. This means that sometimes, we’ll visit take-out only spots that won’t seat guests or serve water.

image.alt: Delicious Pizza & Ice Cream Tour of Richmond

item.title: Scott's Addition Brews & Bites Tour
item.description:
Rapidly-evolving Scott’s Addition is quickly becoming Richmond’s go-to for food, drink, and fun. This one-time industrial neighborhood just west of downtown is now home to more breweries, cideries, and entertainment venues that you can count. And we haven’t even started talking about food yet!
Joining Discover Richmond Tours means exploring the neighborhood as an insider. You will visit several top restaurants, markets, and eateries, sampling delicious food and snacks from each. You’ll get a glimpse of the booming craft beverage industry that is bringing the world to Richmond. And you’ll get to discover Scott’s Addition like a true Richmonder.
Highlights include: - Visit a handful establishments to taste one of their best dishes – more than enough food for a meal! - Learn about Scott’s Addition’s days as an industrial powerhouse – who exactly is Scott anyway? - Whet your whistle with a beverage from two local breweries

image.alt: Scott's Addition Brews & Bites Tour

item.title: Shadows of Shockoe Ghost Tour
item.description: As an historic city, Richmond has plenty of haunts. Explore Richmond’s oldest and most-ghosted neighborhood on this tour of Shockoe Bottom, where more than 400 years of history were made. While you walk to neighborhood sights like the Old Stone House and the Masons’ Hall, your guide shares stories of purported paranormal activity and the real stories behind each.

image.alt: Shadows of Shockoe Ghost Tour

item.title: Scavenger Hunt Experience in Church Hill
item.description: Get to know Richmond, Virginia’s oldest neighborhood while solving clues on this fun, interactive scavenger hunt of Church Hill. This smartphone-based adventure lets you play the game at your own pace, alone or as part of a team. Simply download the app, follow the map, and unlock your questions to start learning and exploring.

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt Experience in Church Hill

item.title: Hollywood Cemetery Segway Tour in Richmond
item.description: One of the most-visited cemeteries in the country, the Hollywood Cemetery in Richmond has a lot to see. This Segway tour lets you glide through the huge cemetery with ease so that you can make it to the gravestones you most want to pay homage to, including those of past presidents and fallen soldiers. Plus, you get unbeatable views of the city and the James River as along the way.

image.alt: Hollywood Cemetery Segway Tour in Richmond

item.title: Richmond Ghosts Boos and Booze Haunted Pub Crawl
item.description: Come on to our Haunted Pub Crawl Tour presented by US Ghost Adventures! Many of the best clubs and pubs in the area are housed in the historic structures that dot the Shockoe Bottom neighborhood of Richmond. This trip is created to give you a taste of the best Richmond has to offer, like Farmhouse hard cider, as well as a window into the afterlife of some of its people, such as the four ghosts rumored to haunt St. John's Church.

image.alt: Richmond Ghosts Boos and Booze Haunted Pub Crawl

item.title: Scavenger Hunt in Downtown Richmond / Capitol Square
item.description: Go beyond capital tours and explore Richmond with your crew via real-time scavenger hunt. Finding clues, snapping photos, and completing challenges, your smartphone will lead you across the city’s best landmarks, from downtown to Shockoe Slip and beyond. As you race the clock, you’ll learn all about Richmond’s 300-year history, racking up points to win it all.

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt in Downtown Richmond / Capitol Square

item.title: Church Hill Segway Tour in Richmond
item.description: Discover Richmond’s historic Church Hill neighborhood with ease on a Segway tour. See St. John’s Episcopal Church, Libby Hill, and more as you glide through the city streets with ease, covering more ground than is possible on a walking tour. Throughout the tour, your guide shares fun facts and stories about the neighborhood’s vibrant history.

image.alt: Church Hill Segway Tour in Richmond

item.title: Brewery Tour of Richmond, VA
item.description: Immerse yourself in the excitement of Richmond, Virginia’s thriving craft beer scene—and learn all about beer styles and the brewing process from your guide—on this private, half-day tour. Meet your guide in central Richmond for a tutored tasting before setting off in your comfortable, air-conditioned minibus. You’ll visit three highlight breweries, will enjoy generous tastings at each, and will go behind-the-scenes at one to learn more about the brewing process.

image.alt: Brewery Tour of Richmond, VA

item.title: Self Guided Richmond Scavenger Hunt: City Center Spectacles
item.description: Sharpen up your trivia skills, explore the city, and have fun on this scavenger hunt of Richmond, Virginia. This app-based adventure lets you compete against your friends and family, or team up with them to compete against others. You’ll visit Richmond landmarks, take photos, and learn about the city's history and culture in a playful, interactive way.

image.alt: Self Guided Richmond Scavenger Hunt: City Center Spectacles

item.title: Uncivil Wards History Tour
item.description:
Richmond's role as the Capitol of the Confederacy during the Civil War brought more than just legislators to the city's doorstep. The many battles that occurred across the state and beyond resulted in a vast number of prisoners and wounded soldiers that needed a place to go. Many of these individuals found themselves in Richmond, particularly the Shockoe Bottom neighborhood where this tour takes place.
This tour will take you to some of the notable sites in the neighborhood, and will also share with you the stories of some of the people with connections to these buildings.

image.alt: Uncivil Wards History Tour

item.title: Phantoms of Franklin Ghost Tour
item.description: Uncover a different side of Richmond’s Franklin Street with this guided ghost-themed walking tour. Walk around to sites such as the Jefferson Hotel, Linden Row Inn, Main Street Library, and other historic locations that are said to be haunted, while listening to tales of spooky encounters and paranormal activity from your guide.

image.alt: Phantoms of Franklin Ghost Tour

item.title: Haunted Capitol Hill Ghost Tour
item.description: Put a spin on a Richmond city tour and learn about the city’s haunted past from a guide during this Richmond Capitol Hill Haunted Ghost Tour. Perfect for history lovers and fans of the paranormal, this tour stops at the Berkeley Hotel, Virginia State Capitol Building, Virginia Executive Mansion, and the Monumental Church. Prebook your experience and get ready for some of the state’s best ghost stories.

image.alt: Haunted Capitol Hill Ghost Tour

item.title: Richmond's Street Art Segway Tour
item.description: Richmond is well-known for its history, but its modern street art scene is just as deep. This Segway tour takes you to murals created with the Richmond Mural Project, which painted 100 murals around the city. It’s a great way to learn about modern Richmond culture while celebrating the city’s past.

image.alt: Richmond's Street Art Segway Tour

item.title: Would I Lie To You? Mural Walks
item.description: You'll hear an entertaining story about each street mural we see and then have to guess if what you just heard is true or a fanciful lie. Once everyone has guessed, the truth will be revealed.

image.alt: Would I Lie To You? Mural Walks
